admin.py

admin.py¶

class UserCreationForm(forms.ModelForm)¶

A form for creating new users. Includes all the required fields, plus a repeated password.

clean_password2(self)¶

Check the two password entries match.

Parameters:

forms.ModelForm – Django’s form stuff

Raise:

ValidationError: The passwords don’t match.

Returns:

The second password.

save(self, commit=True)¶

Save the provided password in hashed format.

Parameters:

commit – A switch to decide whether to save or not.

Returns:

The user.

class UserChangeForm(forms.ModelForm)¶

A form for updating users. Includes all the fields on the user, but replaces the password field with admin’s disabled password hash display field.

Parameters:

forms.ModelForm – Django’s form stuff.

class UserAdmin(BaseUserAdmin)¶

The forms to add and change user instances.

Parameters:

BaseUserAdmin – Django’s user stuff.

class MenuCategoryAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin)¶

For setting up the category’s in the menu.

Parameters:

admin.ModelAdmin – from Django.

class MenuItemsAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin)¶

For setting up the items in the menu.

Parameters:

admin.ModelAdmin – from Django.
